original_title: Going to the Value Village Thrift Store [in Atlanta in 1989]
overview: The Value Village was a mega-thrift-store in Atlanta, Georgia operated by the Kidney Foundation. Nelson found many items he wanted to purchase that day. His shopping advisor was Tom Zarrilliâ€“ Atlanta's King of Schlock. Video by Nelson Sullivan.
title: Going to the Value Village Thrift Store [in Atlanta in 1989]
